name: Core Shooter
description:
Hot Sale Heat Core Box Sand Core Machine for Casting
MAIN TECH. SPEC
1. Greatest Weight of Sand Cores: 2 Ltr/6kg.

2. The Biggest Size of Core Boxes (L*W*H): 350*260*160mm

3. Itinerary of Plunger Under Pressure: =30mm

4. Size of Heating Plate(L*W): 350*200mm

5. Itinerary of Core-pulling: 125mm/150mm

6. Net Weight of Machine: 430Kg/1185Kg

7. Heating Power: 4 kw to 12 kw

8. Two Size of Appearance of Machine :-
(i) (L*W*H): 1250*700*1850mm
(ii) (L*W*H): 3800*1000*2350mm

9. Total Pneumatic item pneumatic Italian(For Small size).

10. Total Pneumatic item Pneumax Italian make(For Big size).

name: Sand Mixer Muller Machine
description:
1. Used for mixing resin curing agent and sand etc.

2. Turn on and turn off easily, and power failure.

3. Production efficiency: a mixing time of only 10 to 40 seconds, easy to pour the core sand.

4. Low production cost: according to the batch size, with the use of random, resin curing agent with a small amount, mixing process even without dead ends, not residual head sand tailings too.

5. Easy to operate, easy to maintain. Low-speed equipment, no noise.

6. Reduce labor intensity, to achieve the mechanization of production.

7. Total Safety Features.

8. Imported Gear Box.

name: Muffle Furnace / Industrial Oven
description:
Rated Power (KW): 3 KW ~ OVER 50 - 100 KW.

Input Voltage (V): 230 VOLT 50 HZ & 440 V 50 HZ.

Power Source: Electric.

Material Loading Capacity (T): AS PER SIZE.

Max Temperature ( C): 1000-1100 Degree Celsius, 900-1000 Degree Celsius, 1200-1500 Degree Celsius, 1100-1200 Degree Celsius.

Features: Thermocouple, Temperature Control, Energy Regulator, Digital Display.

name: Tumbling M/C
description:
1. Machine Capacity = 400Kg
2. Automatic Grade = Semi Automatic 
3. Size (Hexa) = 2100 X 400mm
4. Power = 3HP and Voltage = 420v
5. Material = Mild Steel
6. Gear Box = Imported Gear Box
7. Cycle Time = 10min.

name: Magnetic Contact Reed Switch
description: Expertly rendered by Carl Hansen & Søn, the lounge chair—first introduced in 1951 and enduring ever since—is available in oak or as a combination of oak and walnut, sourced from sustainable forestry. Choose from seat and back upholstery in a selection of leather options or in a custom fabric.
